muclient.script:
PPI = require("ppi") ppi = PPI.Load("aedf0cb0be5bf045860d54b7") if not ppi then error("Dependency plugin not installed!") end
spdtbl ={} spdind =0 world.Accelerator("ctrl+D", "speedwalk_break")
function ksp(tp,max_tp,zp,max_zp,ap,max_ap,mp,max_mp) play_tp(tp) g_tp=tp g_max_tp=max_tp g_zp=zp g_max_zp=max_zp g_ap=ap g_max_ap=max_ap g_mp=mp g_max_mp=max_mp end
function status(tp,zp,ap,mp) play_tp(tp) g_tp=tp g_zp=zp g_ap=ap g_mp=mp end
function status_simple(tp)
play_tp(tp) g_tp=tp
end
function play_tp(tp) if g_tp == nil or g_max_tp == nil then return end percent=tonumber(tp) / (tonumber(g_max_tp) / 100) if tp > g_tp then ppi.play(GetInfo(67).."/Sounds/Player/tpUp.ogg",0,2*math.floor(percent)-100) elseif tp < g_tp then ppi.play(GetInfo(67).."/Sounds/Player/tpDown.ogg",0,2*math.floor(percent)-100) else ppi.play(GetInfo(67).."/Sounds/Player/tp.ogg",0,2*math.floor(percent)-100) end end
function play_zp(zp) if g_zp == nil or g_max_zp == nil then return end percent=tonumber(zp) / (tonumber(g_max_zp) / 100) ppi.play(GetInfo(67).."/Sounds/Player/zp.ogg",0,2*math.floor(percent)-100) end
function psnd(file) Sound(GetInfo(67).."Sounds/"..file) end function speedwalk_init(speedwalk) spdtbl = utils.split(speedwalk, " ") spdind=1 world.EnableTimer("speedwalk", true) end function speedwalk_process() if #spdtbl +1 ==spdind or spdind==0 then world.EnableTimer("speedwalk", false) spdind=0 return end command=string.gsub(spdtbl[spdind], "_", " ") world.Execute(command) spdind=spdind+1 end function speedwalk_break() if world.GetTimerInfo("speedwalk", 6) ==true then world.EnableTimer("speedwalk", false) else if not spdtbl[spdind] then return end world.EnableTimer("speedwalk", true) end end function speedwalk_breaklegs() world.EnableTimer("speedwalk", false) spdind=spdind-2 end
